quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Movie and Rambo
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, lang, chichiro. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Debra Winger starred in the 1993 Australian movie The Piano and played most of the piano sequences herself.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie 21, the team wins $640,000 dollars before Williams gives chase. Ben gives the chips to Rosa and they agree to meet later. What does Rosa intend to do?

options.text: Give the chips back to the casino and fess up their scheme

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Take the money and leave

questions.question: The 2001 Japanese animated movie Spirited Away is about  Chichiro and her parents being trapped in what seems to be a deserted amusement park.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who is the driver of the limo Rosa enters in the movie 21?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An accomplice of Williams

questions.question: In a classic scene from the Rambo quadrilogy, Rambo kills a guy in a helicopter with a rock. In which Rambo movie does this take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: First Blood

questions.question: In which movies does Rambo fight the Russians?

options.text: Rambo III and First Blood pt. II
First Blood and First Blood pt. II

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rambo III and First Blood pt. II

questions.question: The 2001 Spanish movie Y Tu Mama Tambien translates into what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: And Your Mother Too

questions.question: This 1931 German film by Fritz Lang starred Peter Lorre and Ellen Widmann.  Lorre plays a psychotic murderer of children and is marked by other criminals who are feeling the fallout for his crimes.  Lang based the movie on an article he read about the serial killer Peter Kuerten from Duesseldorf.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: M

questions.question: This 2004 movie is about a secret organization during the reign of the Tang dynasty in China that rises up and opposes the government.  Star Zhang Ziyi lived with a blind girl to prepare for her role as a blind dancer who is suspected of being the daughter of the organizations leader.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: House of Flying Daggers

questions.question: What happens to Ben when he returns to MIT in the movie 21?

options.text: He finds out his winnings are gone from his room.
He offers Rosa to join the team for a final hit in Vegas.
He finds a note telling him he cant graduate.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: In Pirates of the Caribbean: At Worlds End, Will stabbed the heart of Davy Jones with his fathers knife.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This 2004 movie has 3 different stories from the minds of 3 different directors from 3 different Asian countries.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Three Extremes

questions.question: This 1972 Russian movie was the answer to Americas 2001:  A Space Odyssey. The Russian movie was later remade in 2002 with George Clooney.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Solaris

questions.question: One of the staples of the Rambo franchise is the obligatory sequence of guerrilla warfare carnage. In which movie does the guerrilla carnage take place in an underground cave?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rambo III

questions.question: What 1991 movie has this tag?  Each of us is matched somewhere in the world, by our exact double - someone who shares our thoughts and dreams

options.text: Three Lives and Only One Death

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Double Life of Véronique

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Romeo
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, uhf. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of Aaliyahs character in Romeo Must Die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Trish

questions.question: In the ultra-popular Rambo franchise it is not unusual for Rambo to go about his killing with a little help from a friend. In which film would you find Rambo getting help from School Boy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rambo

questions.question: What famous male hip hop artist appears in Romeo Must Die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: DMX

questions.question: Which animal is NOT heard amongst the jungle noises in the opening Indiana Jones daydream sequence from the movie UHF?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Horse

questions.question: Aaliyahs character refers to Anthony Andersons character by what name in Romeo Must Die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Moron

questions.question: What planet is Chief Engineer Philo from in the Weird Al Yankovic movie UHF?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zarcon

questions.question: In what country was the 2000 movie Romeo Must Die filmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Canada

questions.question: How does the love story end in Romeo Must Die ?

options.text: The two characters embrace and walk away
Aaliyahs and Jel lis characters are killed

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The two characters embrace and walk away

questions.question: In the Weird Al Yankovic movie UHF, what hand did Uncle Harvey win the TV station with?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One pair of 7s

questions.question: What actor plays the evil Mac in the 2000 movie Romeo Must Die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Isaiah Washington

questions.question: Which is a world landmark that was NOT destroyed by George in his Rambo daydream sequence from the Weird Al Yankovic movie UHF?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leaning Tower of Pisa

questions.question: Which movie was NOT released in theaters around the same time the 1989 movie UHF was?

options.text: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hook

questions.question: What type of character is Jet Li playing in the action movie Romeo Must Die from 2000?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ex cop

questions.question: Which of these characters gets killed in the movie Romeo Must Die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: When George is feeding Bob Yappys dog treats in the movie UHF, what kind of cookies does he think he is feeding him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mrs. Hockenbergers butter cookies

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Shrek and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What type of accent do the Three Little Pigs from the Shrek movies have?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: German accent

questions.question: What actor received the Razzie Award for Worst Actor for 1982?

options.text: Arnold Schwarzenegger for Conan the Barbarian

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laurence Olivier for Inchon

questions.question: What fake product is Rapunzel revealed to wear in the movie Shrek the Third?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fake hair

questions.question: What song by Madonna does Princess Fiona sing at the end of the first Shrek movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Like a Virgin

questions.question: Who won the Razzie Award for Worst Actor for 1981?

options.text: Richard Harris for Tarzan, the Ape Man
Klinton Spilsbury for The Legend of the Lone Ranger

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Klinton Spilsbury for The Legend of the Lone Ranger

questions.question: How does Princess Fionas mother Queen Lillian break a hole into the wall of the dungeon in the movie Shrek the Third?

options.text: By hitting a very high note

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: With her head

questions.question: What does Shrek use as a candle in the first Shrek movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His ear wax buildup

questions.question: What kind of animal is King Harold, Fionas father in the Shrek movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frog

questions.question: What nightmare does Shrek have about his babies when he learns that he is going to be a father in the movie Shrek the Third?

options.text: A countless number of babies terrorizes him.
The babies look like Prince Charming.
Fiona and the babies chase him with torches.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A countless number of babies terrorizes him.

questions.question: Which of these songs by Aaliyah was included in the soundtrack of the 2000 movie Romeo Must Die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What is the occupation of Doris, one of Cinderellas ugly stepsisters in the Shrek movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She is a bartender.

questions.question: Which of these nominees won the 1980 Golden Raspberry Award for Worst Actor?

options.text: Neil Diamond for The Jazz Singer
Anthony Hopkins for A Change of Seasons

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Neil Diamond for The Jazz Singer

questions.question: What does Sleeping Beauty usually do in the Shrek movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: sleeps

questions.question: What song by Destinys Child was featured in the soundtrack of Romeo Must Die ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Perfect Man

questions.question: What part of his own body does Prince Charming from the Shrek movies adore the most?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His hair

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: William Friedkin and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, friedkin, voices. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In 1978 William Friedkin directed The Brinks Job. The movie was based on the 1950 armed robbery of the Brinks Building in which almost $3 million was stolen. Where did the robbery take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Boston, MA

questions.question: What is the name of the dinosaur that is a mortal enemy of the one-eyed weasel in the 2009 movie Ice Age 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rudy

questions.question: William Friedkin began his directorial career doing documentaries and live TV shows. He won several awards for this documentary about a death-row inmate.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The People vs. Paul Crump

questions.question: William Friedkin was born in Chicago. Illinois in 1935. He became fascinated with movies after watching this film as a boy.

options.text: The Man with the Golden Arm

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Citizen Kane

questions.question: 1971s The French Connection was the first R-rated movie to win the Academy Award for Best Picture since the introduction of the MPAA film rating system.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In 1977 William Friedkin released this remake of the 1953 French film Le Salaire de la Peur. Steve McQueen was the directors first choice for the film.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sorcerer

questions.question: In 1983 William Friedkin released this movie that was presented as a latter-day Dr. Strangelove and was blasted by critics.

options.text: Once Upon A Time In America

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deal of the Century

questions.question: During filming of The Exorcist, William Friedkin employed many D.W. Griffith-esque manipulations to get desired performances. What did Friedkin do to Reverend William OMalley before the take of him reading last rites to Father Karras?

options.text: Informed him that his dog had just passed away

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Slapped him in the face

questions.question: William Friedkin vehemently opposed the casting of Gene Hackman in The French Connection. Which of these actors were NOT considered to play Popeye Doyle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lee Marvin

questions.question: William Friedkin moved to Hollywood in 1965. In 1967 he released his first feature, Good Times, starring this famous duo.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sonny and Cher

questions.question: Warner Brothers approached many directors before signing William Friedkin to direct The Exorcist. Which of these directors was NOT approached?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Schlesinger

questions.question: Which of these actors voices Diego, the saber-tooth tiger from Ice Age 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Denis Leary

questions.question: William Friedkin directed several art films after Good Times, including the Golden Globe-nominated film version of this off-Broadway play written by Mart Crowley.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Boys in the Band

questions.question: In what year was The Exorcist released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1973

questions.question: In 1980 William Friedkin released Cruising, a controversial movie about a serial killer who targets gay men during the 1970s. What actor starred as Officer Steve Burns in this movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Pacino

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and William Friedkin

questions.question: What type of animated character, named Darlin, did Whoopi Goldberg voice in the 2006 animated movie Everyones Hero?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Baseball bat

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Smith

questions.question: After fairly positive reviews and minor financial success with 1987s Rampage and 1990s The Guardian, in 1994 William Friedkin released this movie starring David Caruso, Linda Fiorentino, and Chazz Palminteri.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jade

questions.question: In 2007, William Friedkin directed Bug, a film based on the play by Tracy Letts. The Boston Heralds Stephen Schaefer called the movie One of the most disturbing horror movies imaginable. What actress starred in this movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ashley Judd

questions.question: What is the name of the character voiced by Michelle Pfeiffer in the 1998 Academy Award-winning animated movie The Prince of Egypt?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tzipporah

questions.question: In 1985 William Friedkin directed To Live and Die in L.A. It was based on the novel written by former Secret Service agent Gerald Petievich, who co-wrote the screenplay with Friedkin. Who plays master counterfeiter Rick Masters in this movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Willem Dafoe

questions.question: In 2000 William Friedkin directed the movie Rules of Engagement, about a marine colonel who is brought to court-martial after he orders his troops to fire into a crowd in Yemen. Which two actors starred in this movie?

options.text: Samuel L. Jackson and Tommy Lee Jones

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Samuel L. Jackson and Tommy Lee Jones

questions.question: What kind of animal character is Don Lino, voiced by Robert De Niro in the 2004 comedy movie Shark Tale?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shark

questions.question: William Friedkin directed a 2007 episode of this TV drama in which he again worked with To Live and Die in L.A.s star William Petersen.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

questions.question: What Academy Award-winning actress voiced Grendels Mother in the 2007 performance capture movie Beowulf?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Angelina Jolie

questions.question: What Academy Award-winning actress voiced the Queen Ant in the 2006 animated movie The Ant Bully?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meryl Streep

questions.question: In what popular animated movie did Matthew Broderick voice the character Simba the lion?

options.text: The Lion King II: Simbas Pride

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What type of animal character, named Master Shifu, did Dustin Hoffman voice in the 2008 animated movie Kung Fu Panda?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Red Panda

questions.question: What popular comedian and actor voiced the characters Ramon and Lovelace in the 2006 animated movie Happy Feet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robin Williams

questions.question: What is the name of the 1998 animated movie in which Kevin Spacey voiced an evil grasshopper named Hopper?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Bugs Life
